partnerDetails.about:
Simtek is a company that was founded in 2010 in Stip in order to offer on the market its ideas for simple solutions in the electrical industry. Since 2013, Simtek is also present in Skopje.

The name SIMTECH SOLUTION is a derivation of the English words SIMPLY and TECHNOLOGY, while the word SOLUTION, in addition to denoting a solution, aims to support the name SIMTECH as a term for solutions, ie to emphasize: SYMTEK IS RES.

The basis for such an analogy is the vision of SIMTECH SOLUTION, to really offer simple solutions for users, which also contain durability, quality and flexibility.

This fact is not supported by several facts such as:

  • We work exclusively with quality and globally accepted brands.
  • We are evolving along with technology.
  • We invest in knowledge and resources.
